properties.title: Centre Nature, Les Cerlatez
properties.abstract: Les Cerlatez Nature Centre, which is situated very close to the Etang de la Gruère nature reserve, stages temporary exhibitions on themes related to nature. The Centre arranges guided tours of this magnificent reserve, which comprises one of Switzerland's largest peat bogs.
properties.description: The Nature Centre, located at the approach to the Etang de la Gruère reserve, aims to raise awareness about the environment and educate visitors on this subject. Situated as it is in the heart of the Franches-Montagnes region, the Centre offers a range of activities and events, guided tours and walks that are open to everyone. Please note that special theme days - «Lynx Discovery» and «In the Footsteps of the Smugglers» -  can be organized if advance reservations are made.
properties.name: Jura Tourisme
